Name: Teravolt
Effect: If a Move, Item or Ability would prevent this Pokemon from targeting a foe or inflicting an effect, ignore it. (e.g. A Pokemon with Immunity can be Poisoned, A Pokemon with Levitate can be hit by Ground moves).
Description: There's a ball of blue lightning coming out of this Pokemon that prevents its foes from being out of reach, no matter what you do, it will zap you.
